backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining messaging, profiles, conversations, and call signaling (offers, answers, candidates, status) with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding an empty calls map.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs for call and WebRTC functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files including components, hooks, screens, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app and main.tsx script.
frontend/README.md: Developer documentation outlining project structure, development workflow, and deployment steps.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router setup with layout, authentication, chat screens, settings, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/CallModal.tsx: Modal UI for WebRTC calls handling media setup, offer/answer flow, ICE candidates, and call controls.
frontend/src/components/DeveloperInfoCar: UI card showing developer guidance, code locations, deployment instructions, and documentation link.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form that collects name and email, then saves the user profile via a mutation with success and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/WhatchatLayout.t: App layout providing header, navigation, and logout handling, showing unread chat counts and routing controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor chat methods for profiles, conversations, messaging, and unread counts.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRTCCall.ts: Hook managing WebRTC media setup, peer connection, remote streams, ICE handling, and call controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom color/theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/screens/AuthScreen.tsx: Displays the login page, redirects authenticated users, and offers Internet Identity sign‑in plus feature highlights.
frontend/src/screens/ChatListScreen.tsx: Shows the user’s chat list, supports refreshing conversations, and lets users start new chats by entering a Principal ID.
frontend/src/screens/ChatThreadScreen.ts: Renders a conversation thread with message send/refresh logic, read marking, and call initiation via WebRTC offer handling.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Provides user profile info, displays and copies the Principal ID, and shows developer info, redirecting if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters across routing modes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines project state, including versioning, high-level app goals, and a list of existing features for the Whatchat messaging app.
